welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brunssum, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay here."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liege Airport, mainly used for cargo and private flights.
